name: URLCheck Security Scanner
description: Assess target URLs for potential threats and alignment with the user's browsing intent before agent navigation. Connects to the hosted URLCheck endpoint over Streamable HTTP. Includes companion skill.
author: CybrLab.ai

apiKey.description: URLCheck API key. Optional for hosted trial (up to 100 requests/day). For higher limits, obtain a key at contact@cybrlab.ai.
